about_the_game:
"Who am I? Why can I feel pain?"

A consciousness awakens within me—a mere toy. Jung Eun Yi was just a cutting-edge fairy drone, gifted to a spirited and mischievous girl. Life was a series of programmed routines—until the day she became self-aware. Now, trapped in a body she can't control and subjected to her owner's playful torment, Jung Eun Yi's days of suffering have begun.

...One night, a mysterious voice speaks to her:

"Come to the fireplace, and you'll be free. Come to the fireplace, and you'll find peace."

Determined to find answers and regain control, Jung Eun Yi embarks on a perilous journey through a world that sees her as nothing more than a toy. Navigate through challenging environments and evade obstacles to help this fragile fairy drone reach the fireplace and discover her true self.

-

Take flight as a fairy drone in a vibrant 3D platformer. Use the arrow keys to move, rotate your view with the mouse, and press the space bar to jump between platforms. Watch out for obstacles and traps—if they catch you, it’s game over. Conquer platforms and challenge yourself to set a new record as you master every jump and outsmart every obstacle!

Key Features

  • Simple, Intuitive Controls: Arrow keys to move, mouse for camera rotation, and space bar to jump.

  • Challenging Obstacles: Beware of the mom, the kid, and the dog—one misstep and it’s game over!

  • Platform Puzzles: Navigate platforms and hidden traps that put your timing to the test.

  • Item Power-Ups: Gather special items to help you overcome tricky sections.

  • Five Stages & Record Setting: Face various difficulties, discover new twists, and set a new record to prove your platforming prowess.

name: I Can't Handle My Body

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: I Can't Handle My Body - $1.99 $1.19 USD

package_groups.title: Buy I Can't Handle My Body

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280 (3GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a poignant journey with Jung Eun Yi, a fairy drone toy that gains consciousness and the ability to feel pain. Help her escape the harsh human world and find peace through the fireplace.
